levels.notes: The ground floor layout is designed in a Colonial style with a mix of open spaces and defined rooms. Vastu principles have been considered by orienting the master bedroom in the north-east corner, ensuring that the living room receives ample light from the south. The entrance is positioned on the front to welcome visitors while maintaining privacy.

openings.name: rooftop_terrace_access
openings.description: Staircase leading from the first floor to the rooftop terrace, ensuring privacy and ease of access.

levels.notes: The first floor consolidates additional bedrooms and a common bathroom. A staircase leads to the rooftop terrace on the rear side for relaxation and panoramic views. Vastu guidelines ensure that the stairs do not directly align with windows or doors.

rooms.name: rooftop_terrace
rooms.description: Spacious terrace designed for leisure and gatherings, with a mix of seating areas and greenery.

levels.notes: The rooftop terrace offers an outdoor living space with privacy screens in line with Vastu principles. It serves as a relaxing retreat away from the main building activities.
